oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Go Down Moses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hayes, Roland (1887-1977)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Spirituals (Songs)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Roland Hayes performing Go Down Moses, accompanied by pianist Lawrence Brown.

H[arry].T[hacker]. Burleigh (1866-1949) is credited with the concept of arranging spirituals as art songs. Here the former Fisk Jubilee Quartet tenor singer, Roland Hayes, performs Burleigh's arrangement of Go Down Moses.
